text: is it normal that lots of lectures are out of dates? I often have to work around directives that does not work or does not have the expected result.

Hey there it is not the norm. Apologize for any inconvenience. Irony is most of the CMS development videos are from within a year ago, we’re just moving very quickly and it takes a lot of time to get videos updated. Work is in progress.

We’re working on it. If you respond with the video you were watching and where you ran into a snag I’ll make sure to let the academy team know. I can also probably point you to the relevant developer documentation for that thing.

Otherwise our developer documentation should be seen as a source of truth.
